duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing maintenance and troubleshooting on manufacturing equipment to ensure safe and efficient operations.
Adhering to plant safety and environmental guidelines, policies, and procedures.
Installing, repairing, and maintaining mechanical drives, chains, sprockets, gears, belts, and couplings.
Troubleshooting and repairing mechanical and electrical problems in accordance with plant policies and procedures.
Reading and interpreting mechanical and electrical schematics.
Completing mechanical and electrical preventive maintenance activities.
Performing tasks such as lifting, walking, climbing, stooping, standing, pushing, and/or pulling in a manufacturing environment.
Supporting safe working environment by maintaining strict adherence to safety rules and wearing appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

education_certification.credential: At least one year of maintenance experience within an industrial, manufacturing, or military environment.
